Package com.esri.svr.ejb

Contains two EJB samples: SimpleEJB and AdvancedEJB.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Catalog This interface defines the functionality of a Catalog EJB.
CatalogHome This interface defines functions to create a Catalog object.
LayoutService This interface defines functionality of a layout service.
LayoutServiceHome This interface defines functions to create a LayoutService object.
MapServiceI This interface defines an additional function for getting all service info.
MapServiceIHome This interface defines funtion to create a MapServiceI object.
MapServiceII This interface defines functionality of a map service.
MapServiceIIHome This interface defines method for creating a MapSerivceII ojbect.
ServiceCatalogLocal ServiceCatalog local interface for service catalog bean
ServiceCatalogLocalHome This interface defines methods for creating and finding SeriviceCatalogLocal object and other supporting methods for returing all services and checking service type, validity and supported image formats.
 

Class Summary
CatalogBean This class implements the functionality defined in Catalog and CatalogHome interfaces.
LayoutServiceBean This class provides implementation of LayoutService and LayoutServiceHome interfaces in addition to SessionBean interface.
MapServiceIBean This class provides implementation of MapServiceI and MapServiceIHome interfaces in addition to SessionBean interface.
MapServiceIIBean This class provides implementation of MapServiceII and MapServiceIIHome interfaces in addition to SessionBean interface.
ServiceCatalogBean This class provides partial implementations of ServiceCatalogLocal and ServiceCatalogLocalHome interfaces in addition to the EntityBean interface.
ServiceCatalogBeanBMP This class provides full implementations of ServiceCatalogLocal and ServiceCatalogLocalHome interfaces as a BMP (Bean Managed Persistence).
 

Package com.esri.svr.ejb Description

Contains two EJB samples: SimpleEJB and AdvancedEJB. This package contains two EJB samples but consists of five EJBs: SimpleEJB (MapServiceI, MapServiceIHome, and MapServiceIBean);  AdvancedEJB (MapServiceII, MapServiceIIHome, and MapServiceIIBean); LayoutServiceEJB (LayoutService, LayoutServiceHome, and LayoutServiceBean); CatalogEJB (Catalog, CatalogHome, and CatalogBean); and a local entity bean, ServiceCatalog (ServiceCatalogLocal, ServiceCatalogLocalHome, and ServiceCatalogBean/ServiceCatalogBeanBMP).
